course-details.title: Introduction to JavaScript
course-details.content: Learn the Basics of JavaScript. JavaScript is a versatile programming language that powers the web. In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, including syntax, data types, and control structures.

course-details.title: Cloud Computing Essentials
course-details.content: Master Cloud Fundamentals. Learn the foundations of cloud computing and explore popular cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. This course is ideal for IT professionals and developers looking to transition.

course-details.title: Advanced Python Programming
course-details.content: Master advanced Python techniques, including OOP, decorators, generators, and more. Designed for developers with a basic understanding of Python.

course-details.title: Data Science with Python
course-details.content: Learn how to analyze and visualize data using Python libraries like Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn. Explore real-world data sets.

course-details.title: Crypto Currency
course-details.content: Understand the basics of cryptocurrency, blockchain technology, and how digital currencies are changing the financial world.

course-details.title: Web Development Bootcamp
course-details.content: A complete bootcamp to learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frontend frameworks to build responsive web applications.

course-details.title: Advanced Web Development
course-details.content: Deep dive into web architecture, backend integration, REST APIs, and advanced JavaScript libraries for dynamic web apps.

course-details.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
course-details.content: An introductory course to ML concepts including supervised and unsupervised learning, model evaluation, and Python-based implementation.
